case.state: Hey, who's Little Miss Chatterbox over here? And what does she know about bending?
How do you know about bending? Are you a bender? You don't seem familiar, and you're definitely not from my world...
J-jeez! I was told it'd be warmer here! I should've brought heavier clothing...
Ah, playing a game on the beach? Well, it's not kuai ball, but in many ways this is more fun!
Hmm, I can't see very well on sand. It's so loose and shifty, it makes everything look fuzzy. Oh well, I'll still win this!
I'm glad I at least improved my sandbending before coming here. Sand mostly makes everything look fuzzy.
Finally! A vacation. Time to kick back, relax, and play some games.
I've been so stressed with my work at my school, I almost forgot what it's like to kick back and do nothing.
Back for a rematch? Just remember, I've beaten you before and I'll do it again.
Welcome back, ~player~. Did you come to take another beating?
What's up? I'm Toph Beifong. You may have heard of me. "Greatest Earthbender in the World"--does that ring any bells?
The name's Toph Beifong, but I go by many names. "The Blind Bandit," "The Runaway," "The Greatest Earthbender in the World"--ever heard of me?
You seem... oddly familiar, somehow. Even though I've never met you... Aang? No...
...Twinkletoes? Is that you? ...No, you're not Aang. Could be awkward if you were.
Wow, you're certainly talkative. I can tell this will be a fun game. Who even are you?
Am I sensing this right? Are you... human?
Whoa. Am I sensing this right? Are you... made of metal?
I've met people with metal limbs before, but never an entire person made of metal! Weird...
Am... am I sensing things correctly, or is that a person made of stone?
Is... is that a living person made of stone, or do my feet need their eyes checked?
Huh? Who's there?
Strange... Usually I can sense everyone near me... unless they're not on the ground!
Yeah, yeah, let's star---OW! HEY! What was that for?!
Uh... yeah, like I know what any of that means, lady. Seems kind of creepy, to be honest.
Wait, other people will be seeing this?! Sweet! Can't wait for everyone to watch me kicking your butts!
I'm pretty awesome, right? I've learned to make up for my blindness with my seismic sense--using earthbending to feel all of you standing on the ground around me.
Oh, wait, you must be one of Aang's past lives, right? That makes sense. Either way, I hope you're ready to lose!
Wait a minute, you must be one of the previous Avatars, right? Since this is some kind of multiverse or something?
Don't think you have an advantage, Floaty Pants. I've dealt with airbenders before. This just means it'll be harder to tell when you're bluffing.
Time to win this game like an Earth Rumble Tournament!
I figured I should take a break from running my Metalbending Academy and wind down. This seems like the best way to do it!
I've never played with cards before, but I'm no stranger to gambling. This should be a cinch!
I haven't gone on as many real adventures since starting my Metalbending Academy, so you'd better make this count!
At this point, I'm not even gonna bother feeling the cards. I'll take my chances with what I got.
...Actually, I think I'll just stick with the hand I got.
You know? I'll take my chances with these cards.
I can work with this.
Almost perfect! Let me just remove this one...
Just one more... c'mon...
Just one, please!
This isn't working. I'll take five new ones.
This whole hand is crap. Sorry--goodbye, cards!
I'll swap out ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~.
These cards are fine.
Should I replace ~cards.ifPlural(these cards|this card)~?... Couldn't hurt, I suppose.
Could I have ~cards.text~ new ones?
Ha! I got a good feeling about this one.
Few have messed with the Blind Bandit and lived to tell the tale. That doesn't look like a streak that'll end to~background.time~!
Heh! Looks like everything is coming up Toph.
So, why did you guys come here, anyway? Was it boredom? The thrill of trying something new and stripping for others? Or have you been here before?
When I was a kid, I used to love fighting. Still do! If anyone's down for one after I beat you all at this game, I'd love to challenge any of you!
So, ~player~, why don't you tell us about yourself? I figure I should know a little more about you before I kick your butt.
I knew this game would be easy. Ready to lose, ~player~?
Phew! Toph, you rule.
Hey, am I doing this right? I'm trying to put on a "poker face."
Well, my hand's ready. Bring it on, guys!
Ha! Get ready to read 'em and weep, because I sure can't!
I don't know why, but being out here, all exposed like this, is kind of making my heart race...
Just because I'm naked and all, don't expect me to give up right away!
Don't think I'm done yet! I'm going for the win!
Okay... just a little more to go...
Whew! Just in the nick of time.
Phew... just a few more hands like this, I have a shot of winning the whole thing!
Alright! This ends now!
So far, so good...
Decent start. I can work with these.
I bet you're looking forward to seeing me take off these shorts. But... you'll have to wait!
It'll take more than losing my top to take me out!
Come on, cards... work with me here...
I've never actually played poker before, but it seems close enough to some of the card games we have back in the Earth Kingdom.
The most popular game we have back home is called Pai Sho. I wonder if strip Pai Sho is a thing!
I've needed a break like this for a while. Running my academy, occasionally helping deal with political conflicts... I've missed just having fun, playing games!
Do most games here have this much talking between rounds? In Gaoling, we usually save conversation for after the game.
I know the basics of this game, but I just learned to read these cards. Is this a good hand or a bad hand? You're as sure as me!
I don't know if this was clear, but I can recognize anyone after I meet them by their footsteps. So don't even think about trying to fool me with a disguise.
It's nice to get a chance to relax a little. I hardly ever get those. Although I never guessed I'd spend my break surrounded by people getting naked.
I suppose if I wanted to add more clothing, I could've worn shoes today, but why would I ever do that?
You know what we should've played? The poundy-poundy game! You know, where you hit the hammer and it knocks a ball up a tower to ring a bell? I'm great at that one!
I prefer keeping my chest wrapped when on the field. A little uncomfortable, but necessary for the kind of work I do.
Well, this could go either way, but it's early enough that I'm not really that concerned.

I disagree that the way to achieve inner peace is by separating yourself from earthly pleasures. If anything, you should indulge yourself in those... do you notice any "earthly pleasures" worth indulging in, ~player~?
...I shouldn't have exchanged that one, should I?
Hmm. Maybe it's just 'cause I'm so new to this, but I'm thinking I shouldn't have swapped some of those cards...
Hmm. I see this will be more of a challenge than I expected. But that's what I signed up for!
I can already see I'm gonna lose this next hand. And I can't even see!
If only I could use my bending to get out of this. Too bad I can't paperbend or something...
You should consider yourselves lucky that I can't cheat! But I'm not a cheater anyway... well, except that one time...
...Well, this sucks.
Guess there's no point trying to change these. Hope they're good enough.
Ha! Ha-ha-ha... I'm doomed.
I've handled literal terrorist factions and prevented tyrants from taking over the world, yet somehow this game is stumping me...

Some people have asked if I can dream as a blind girl. I can. In fact, I had a dream a few weeks ago that I wasn't as good a bender, and my friends' names were all pronounced differently, and everyone was acting very strange... I didn't like it.
Monkeyfeathers! I'm going to lose at this rate, aren't I?
Hmph!
Oh, flying hog monkeys! Why did I trade those?
Pfft--do your worst, Dealer! I'm in this until the end!
This is the worst game ever. Pff.
You gotta be kidding me!
This is where I'd normally ask for backup, but playing card games isn't like being in battle.
Am I reading the cards wrong? Do my thumbs need their eyes checked?
No... dang it, I am Toph Beifong! I specialize in the impossible! So what if blind girls don't usually win at strip poker? I'll be the first!
Not off to a great start with this hand...
The game's young enough that one bad hand won't hurt me. Because this is quite the bad hand.
This hand doesn't bode well for things to come...
Come on, Dealer, give me a break...
Hey, Dealer, who do you think you're dealing with?
You're gonna have to be more specific, Tall Lady! I've been on enough adventures for a lifetime, let alone 18 years!
That's... interesting, Fluttershy. I wonder how long lion turtles' lifespans are...
Nope! First time. Guess I just catch on easily, or maybe you just suck. Either way, points for Toph!
Hey, don't push it, Chatterbox. I'll pay you after you teach me something.

state.text: Hey, don't worry, lady. I won't be looking at whatever that is!

case.state: Ha! Good one, Polly! You got Chatterbox good!
Oh yeah, lavabending is a type of earthbending alright. I got a student who can do it. I'm glad I've never been close enough to try!
I'll let you know if I notice any. They're small, but I can still sense 'em from several feet away.
Oh! Get 'em up close, then when they're distracted, hit 'em with a rockpile behind their head! They never see it coming!
There used to be dragons where I'm from, but Fire Lord Sozin wiped 'em all out. Guy was a real moron.
Uh-huh. Listen, I'm not judging. I'd find me pretty hot, too.
My world has four... well, three nations. They were actually at war for most of my childhood, but that's over--and I helped finish it!
Gah... I can even tell you're not lying. Doesn't matter. I'll find out one of these days.
...What type of machine? What would it do for me? You say it's safe, but what's it for? Gonna have to say no to this one.
Ha! Listen, no offense but I really don't think you want a blind girl steering a spaceship.
Blah, blah, everyone has powers where I'm fr---WHOA! Okay, that's new...
Yeah, my feet. A friend of mine accidentally burnt them one time, and that was a pain. Can't imagine living without 'em!
Yeah, I can see that. I'm still surprised, though. I've never met a person made of metal before.
Pfft, really? What a shocker! Nah, I guessed as much by how nervous you are, Nanoko.
Oh! Armor would be neat! Something to cover me during fights, and that I can just bend to take off!
Hah! That sounds just like ol' Twinkletoes!
Well, I prefer to get around on foot, but I guess riding on Appa isn't so bad.
What's an infinity p... you know what, never mind. I'll be a badgermole. Seems obvious for me.
Well, it's pretty difficult to see on the sand. It's all loose and shifty, though I'm trying to get better at it.
Not really. The Avatar cycle means there's only one Avatar in our world at a time. He's kinda special--he's supposed to keep the balance of the Four Nations and stuff.
My friendships tend to get off to rocky starts. I first met Aang and his friends after he kicked my butt and humiliated me in an Earth Rumble Tournament. Totally cheated, too...
Ha! You make a compelling case, Batgirl. You're on!
Badgermoles live in caves, so they're blind like me. It's said that humans learned earthbending from them--and I learned it directly from them when I ran away from home as a kid!
No offense, but you're asking the wrong girl about "views."
I once helped some people escape from an underground dungeon. There wasn't any gold in it, though.
Wh-what?! No, I can bend rock, dirt, metal, sand... I've never tried bending people's bones before, but that would be like bloodbending, and that's just messed up!
Uh... can't say I have, but I have ridden on the back of a giant flying bison. Not as fun as you'd expect.
Y'know? Aside from a whole mountain, I've never found a rock I couldn't bend. Maybe I should test my abilities on something, huh?
My friends did, a few times. The one I remember was the day they found the Spirit Library, when I lost Appa. I... don't like thinking about that day.
Are you kidding me? I love showing off! Heck, I may even do that later today if we have time!
Hey, Toro! You wanted to see what I can do with my earthbending? Take a look at this!
Hey... wait a minute, don't you know all this already? Since you know everything about us and all...
Hey, Yumeko! You were asking about earthbending, right? Well, check out what I can do to this bracelet!
Oh! Hey, Chatterbox! You said you wanted to see a demonstration of my bending? Check this out!
Although just so you know, earthbenders can't bend wood or roots. Believe me, I've had plenty of opportunities to try.
Yeah, or put me on ice, as I said... hey, watch it! I can tell you're scheming something!
Listen, lady, I'm trying to save all the money I can for renovations to my school. Why don't you ask my dad? He's got enough.
Hey! I can tell you're lying, remember? Don't worry, though. I can't read either.
Well, duh, of course! Earthball is the other big sport in the Earth Kingdom. You use earthbending to push it back and forth. Whoever makes the other's goal wins!

condition.saying: Funny story -- at GUN HQ, I've been banned from any card games using a Braille deck. You would not believe the fit Topaz threw when she realized I was reading everybody's cards with echolocation...

case.state: Banned, eh? Well, I sure hope you're not doing that now. I kind of need these cards.
That's right, I can't sense anything in the air, or when I'm not on the ground. That's why I don't like flying much. I'm basically completely blind.

condition.saying: You see by feeling? Are you super sensitive?

case.state: Yeah, but I get used to it. I can sense everything within several feet, but I've learned to live with and only take notice when it's something out of the ordinary.

condition.saying: What kind of magic is this "earthbending"? What kind of things do you use it for?

case.state: It's not really "magic," it's more like... an extension of my senses. I use it to bend rocks into different things, yeah, but since I can't see, I also use earthbending to sense things!
Well, I haven't, but my friend Aang has been to the Spirit World a few times!
Me? I think I could adapt nicely as long as said place has some nice, solid earth for me to put my feet on!
I've thought about it! I don't know what I'd get, though. Probably something dangerous! Or maybe I'd go with a badgermole... or would that be too obvious?
Mermaids are real? Huh... Can't say I've ever met one, but I have met a very grumpy sea serpent.
~blank~
Sure does, doesn't it? Seismic sense can be a blessing and a curse sometimes!
Hey, Chatterbox! Are there any famous blind people where you're from?
This bracelet is made of space rock from a meteorite we found. Check this out!
My best friend gave me this bracelet. It's made out of a meteorite that crashed near us. Check this out!
I know I could take off my bracelet instead, but I'm keeping this bad boy until the day I die. Plus, check this out!
By the way, I'm keeping the bracelet. It's a gift from someone very close, and it's useful for bending, too--like this!
I have a different outfit that I wore when I was visiting the Southern Water Tribe a few years back. As you can imagine, it was a lot heavier than what they wear in the Fire Nation.
Nights in the Fire Nation could sometimes have a chill to them, but never enough to make me shiver or anything.
Hey ~player~, I wore a special swimsuit for the occasion! If you can beat me, I may just let you see it...
Phew! Even with how light these clothes are, in heat like this I could really stand to lose them!
A downside of wearing baggy clothes like this is that the heat basically kills you. If I could turn off the sun, I would! Not like it helps me any...
So this is what a library is like? Gotta admit, not really doing it for me.
Does this place have anything I can listen to? As you can guess, I'm not exactly huge on books.
I've been to an ancient library once before. Well, I didn't go inside, I just kinda hung out outside. Libraries don't have much appeal for me.
I never learned how to swim, for obvious reasons. But I surround myself with waterbenders to make up for it.
I may not know how to swim, but I could cool off after the game is over. If you're lucky, maybe it'll even be a skinny-dip.
Hey, after this game is over, who's up for getting drinks? First round's on me if I win!
I wonder if they're serving cactus juice here. I've always wanted to try it after it totally knocked out one of my friends years back.
It's so cold out here! Almost wish I'd have worn shoes... but then I wouldn't be able to see all of you!
Cold as it is, I'd almost expect to be in the Water Tribes right now.
Phew! It's these kinds of days I really could stand to lose some clothing!
I remember the time I was in a place ten times hotter than this. Things... didn't go so well. I sure am glad I'm not battling those odds.
Shame the floor here is made of wood. I'd love to show you guys some real bending!
Hey, while we're waiting, who's up for drinks? If you lose, I'll pay for your first round!
I don't like sand. It's shifty, and it makes it harder for me to see anything. Plus it gets everywhere!
You know, I have been working on my sandbending. I wonder if I could make a sand statue of myself for you after I finish kicking your butts!
Shame the only games they have here are sight-based. I'm pretty good at ones where I can feel what's going on!
I'm glad we're inside. Cold as it was getting here, I'd hate to get frostbite on my toes, or anywhere else!
Last time I was in a super cold climate was when I visited the Southern Water Tribe. It was so cold, I actually had to wear boots! That made it harder to sense things, as you can imagine.
I don't remember the streets of Ba Sing Se or Gaoling having technology like this. I do remember them being this crowded, though.
You've seen one city, you've seen 'em all. Or, well, not seen them, in my case.
This wouldn't be so bad if all those dunderheads weren't staring. Who invited half the freaking Earth Kingdom to watch?
With all my Earth Rumbles, I feel like I should be better in front of crowds than this. Then again, I wasn't naked during any of those.
If you nincompoops are just gonna be back there enjoying the show, at least get naked too! Give the rest of us something to work with...
Last time I dressed in Fire Nation clothing, it was years ago and I was going undercover during the war. I think it suits me well, don't you think, ~player~?
The Fire Nation has an interesting climate. Bit hotter than the Earth Kingdom, hence the generally lighter clothing.

I actually got my bracelet in the Fire Nation years ago! A meteorite crashed there and Katara, Aang and I had to put out the fires. Later, we used the material to make a sword for Sokka and my bracelet!
Is anyone else even here besides you and me, ~player~?
So... are you a spirit? One of my friends can communicate with spirits, but I've never met one myself.
So... are you a spirit? One of my friends has been to the spirit world and back. I wonder if they play poker in the spirit world...
I gotta admit, this is a lot less enjoyable when I can only sense one of you.
"Hey, thanks for getting naked so early, Toph." "No problem, ~player~."
Is there a minimum clothing requirement? There should be. You noodle-brains are still stripping and I'm kinda getting bored over here.
I'm getting a little tired of this game now. Someone just do something!
Too many dunderheads left to wait for! How many rounds are left in this stupid game?
Hmmm. I can tell one of you is cheating. I don't know who yet, but I'll find out.
As a former Earth Rumble champion, I feel strongly about people cheating to win things. As in, I really don't like it... unless the person you're cheating is also a cheater.
So, ~blind~, you really are blind too, huh? Guess it's nice to share the table with someone else like me.
No offense, ~blind~, but you being here and all makes me glad I have seismic sense. Being blind sucks without it!
Hey, ~artist~, I don't get the appeal of paintings, but Katara says it's customary to have one made of yourself if you're anyone who's anyone. So you wanna paint me sometime?
I'm a bit of an artist myself, ~artist~! Well... I've made a lot of statues of myself. No sweat, really.
...Okay, I'll stop with the one-liners now. I'm clearly not as good at this as I had hoped.
I know a lot of you dunderheads say that Earth Rumbles are scripted, but I can tell you it's 100 percent real!
Oh, and I know what some of you are thinking, but Earth Rumbles are 100 percent real! I'd never throw a match in my life...
All guys, huh? I've taken worse than you before. I have nothing to worry about.
Hey, if it helps make it less awkward, just think of me as one of the boys!
Well... here we are. It's just you and me now.
Don't think I can't take you, ~opp~. One on one!
And the crowd goes wild! Toph vs. ~opp~! Who will be the winner?
Any chance of losing anytime soon, ~player~? I'm getting a little bored over here.
Here, ~player~! Maybe this will "help" with your playing skills.
Why do I feel the need to tell you guys what my hand is, anyway? Not like it'll make it any better or worse...
Uh, no, I'm from Gaoling, in the southern Earth Kingdom. Where's Liyue?
Not really, unless they're on the ground. You realize how my seismic sense works, right? I sense people through vibrations in the Earth.
Oh, if you're asking if I can tell penis sizes, I can sense that through the clothing easily. But they gotta have a good wit as well!
It's okay, you can say it. "Because I'm blind"? Yeah, I used to get that a lot, especially from my parents. Not so much now, having saved the world and all.
We have many types of music across the four nations! I have a friend who's great at the tsungi horn! As for me, I'm into heavy, rhythm-intensive stuff.
I guess you could say pro bending is kinda like wrestling! But I haven't done that for a few years now. I've been focusing on running my school and helping my friends.
Mostly, Ladybug! I had an earthbending teacher, but he was kinda useless since the badgermoles already taught me. Otherwise, I just taught myself!
You remind me of my friend Katara. She always thought it was better to give students a gentle nudge.
Hey, I like my clothes as they are. They serve their purpose--I can fight in 'em without tearing 'em. Isn't that good enough?
Ha! I can see you just fine, but I don't see the same way you do. I feel the vibrations through the ground.
You got it, Space Ace! Earthbending allows me to feel vibrations through the ground, so I can sense all your forms.
Ha! Don't worry about it, I can read the cards just fine. That's why this deck has bumps on 'em. But I can sense you and everyone else too.
Ha! Don't worry, I'm not offended. But I get what you mean about being seen as weaker. That's why I'm glad I don't see anyone as weaker or otherwise!
Not everyone, but maybe about half the people from each of the nations can bend an element!
Ha! Don't worry, I'm not offended or anything. What do you wanna know about my blindness?
Oh, I get my share of fanboys, for sure. It's like I'm a celebrity! I'll humor them for a bit until they're scared away.
Yeah, that's me. Can't exactly read these cards without 'em.
Why yes, I am an earthbender, and a master one at that! What's Team Magma's all about?
Yeah, shoes aren't really "me," y'know? I like feeling the ground beneath my feet. I literally need to!
I'd love to, but, uh, my type of fighting is a little different than you're used to. Unless you're an earthbender and just aren't telling me?
Eh. I'm sure I'm not missing much. Plus, even without my sight, I can read people a lot better than you'd expect.
Yeah, unless they make you float as well, I'd still be able to sense you.
Credit to everyone who ever told me I couldn't do stuff because I was blind. Spite can be a powerful motivator to raise your confidence!
Think of it as a kind of martial art. Although for me, it's more like... another sense? Since I was born blind, I've used it for things that I could not see.
Favorite scents, eh? Well, the smells of Fire Nation food certainly stick with you! I can smell the spice from a mile away!

Favorite sounds? Well, when we're sleeping outside at night and things get really quiet, and all we can hear are animals chirping and stuff, that's... nice. We rarely had calm nights during the war, though.
Happy to oblige! Earthbending can definitely give you a full-body workout... though you seem awful excited to see under my shirt...
Eh. I've always wondered about the Moon and stars, since my friends keep talking about how beautiful they are, but they don't matter much to me if they're not really here, y'know?
Well, I guess just under half of the Earth Kingdom's citizens are earthbenders... but none of them can do it like me, though!
Well, I do like the competitive nature of strip poker. It reminds me of when I used to do Earth Rumble fights, the same sort of excitement. But also...
...Well, I was going to say that I haven't encountered any Venus Djinn, but now I'm trying to figure out where this Fizz is. I can't sense him anywhere!
What's Twi... never mind. If it's important, I'll find out. Uh, I guess I just like playing for the thrill of the competition?
You're kidding. ...You're kidding, right? I'm blind!
Um, hello? I'm blind, genius. I don't really have much use for reading material.
Uh, I dunno what these bumps are, I just learned them. And what's braille?
No need to be so formal. You can call me Toph. And I love talking about bending!
Uh, not really. I was kept inside for years, and I don't really go to a lot of libraries. One of the last times I went to one, something really bad happened to my friends.
When you put it that way... yeah, I guess bending is a superpower, isn't it? Why do you ask?
People mostly know me by my own name, but I've been called a few things. Back when I fought in the Earth Rumbles, I went by "The Blind Bandit"!
Easy peasy! I can feel every detail of people's bodies. If they like me, their heartbeat speeds up--and something else starts to rise.
Closest I've ever met is King Bumi of Omashu. I duked it out with him a few years ago!
I have a student who can bend magma, but I never get close enough to try. But I can bend rock, dirt, mud, sand, cement... heck, even metal!
You mean like... bending a rock and shoving it inside myself? Don't you think that would be uncomfortable?
What do you mean? I thought I told you, I came here for the fun of the game.
Oh! You know the poundy-poundy game? Where you hit the hammer and it knocks a ball up a tower to ring a bell? I'm great at that one!
Well, you aren't planning on flying off the ground anytime soon, are you?
That's right! Before my parents broke up, we were the richest family in the Earth Kingdom! How could you tell?
You mean seismic sense? Yeah, I came up with that. It's not common among earthbenders.
You got that right. I hate flying and being on boats for that very reason. And don't even think about asking me to swim.
Yeah, that happens a lot. We just got out of a big war several years back. The Fire Nation got too big for their britches, but I helped put a stop to that.
Yeah, that happens a lot. We just got out of a big war several years back, and more recently I had to take care of a bending supremacist uprising against nonbenders back in Cranefish Town.
You think so? Well... thanks. That means a lot actually. I'd return the compliment, but... well, you know.
You're right about that! I teach metalbending. Only a few earthbenders got the stuff, but it's a good skill to have! Plus, I like bossing people around. Oh, and yelling!
I've always wanted to go treasure-hunting! But I've never had the chance to. I bet you'd be good at it, too--you'd fit right into tiny crevices!
Are you trying to cheer me up or make me punch you in the face, lady? I can't even sense anything.
What? No! I wouldn't... ugh! Haven't you ever heard of bending before? You know, where you use the elements like earth, fire, air, and water and make them do stuff?
And how exactly am I supposed to take it without offense, o great Madam Frilly Frou-Frou?
"Geo Vision"? You mean my earthbending? Yeah, it's pretty cool, huh! I take it you've never been to the Earth Kingdom?
We learned earthbending from the badgermoles! When I was a kid, I learned directly from them after I ran away from home and hid in a cave. Other bending techniques came from other animals!
Eh, not like I have a choice what I can or can't sense. Not like I go out of my way to spy on everyone I meet.
Those are some big words for someone with the sweet tooth of a child.
It's all about earthbending! My feet act like my eyes would if I could see like you guys. I step my feet on the earth and can sense anything standing around me!
Uh, no, I've never met any Venus Djinn. My friend Aang is really more of the spirit guy than me.
Well, I'm always down for being complimented, but knowing that you're getting horny for me is good enough for now.
That's right! When I was a kid, I learned to "see" with seismic sense. That means I can sense everything around me within a radius by feeling the vibrations through the ground.
Jewels and crystals? Well, I've never tried, but those shouldn't be too different from regular rocks. Why?
No idea who Eggman is, but from what you're describing, I'm guessing he uses some kind of... metal automotons or something? I'd love to try to fight those!
Yeah, I'm from a rich family, I won't deny it. One of the richest in the Earth Kingdom, in fact!
Not just any war--when I was just twelve, I teamed up with Aang to defeat the Fire Nation and end the longest and most dragged-out war that's ever happened to our world!
You do? How, exactly?
Since birth, baby! But I've learned to make up for it with seismic sense--using earthbending to feel the vibrations of everyone around me!

Ha! Don't worry, I'm not really planning on using it here. And I love talking about it! Earthbending is my life--not only have I learned to see with it, it's also great for fighting, in the ring or on the battlefield!
Heh, you'd be into that, wouldn't you? I get the sense that you have a real competitive edge to you. Although my competitive fighting days are mostly behind me. I actually run my own school now.
You underestimate the sheer power of earth. Have you never experienced a vicious mudslide or heard of people trapped in a sinkhole or buried under layers of earth? And we also bend rocks, you know.
Heh, oh, you got me! The Blind Bandit herself was indeed blind since she was born!
I feel everything around me through my feet, as long as it's on the ground, from when your wing twitches to when a bug crawls across the ~background.surface~.

Well, first of all... I used to be an Earth Rumble champion. I'd go up against some of the best earthbenders and win tournament after tournament. I guess I have a competitive nature at heart and wanted to try my hand at this.
Oh, why's that, Demon Lady? We're all born naked anyway.
Back when I fought in the Earth Rumble tournaments, I went by "The Blind Bandit"! Does that work for ya?
A few years ago, I became pretty notorious for pulling scams in the Fire Nation! They called me "The Runaway." I still think it's a cool name!
Oh, come on! I lost first? Guess learning to read those cards was a waste of time...
Huh, I'm first? Well, no big deal, I only just learned to read those cards.
Not used to losing so soon after starting. Usually takes a few rounds to knock me out!
Well. I'd say "No hard feelings," but that would be a lie, wouldn't it?
So I'm really first to get naked, huh? I feel like I should say something smart to lighten the mood...
Hmm... I can't take off my tunic without removing my belt... but if I just removed the belt, my tunic would lose its shape anyway... Oh well, goodbye tunic!
I bet you're wondering how a blind girl is playing cards. Well, that's what the bumps on these cards are for--I just kinda feel them to read what they say.
They had me memorize some bump patterns on these cards before starting. I'd be fine just winging it and seeing what happens, honestly, but they said that was against the rules.
Hmm... pants or shirt? Pants or shirt? Decisions, decisions...
My turn again... I guess some of you may be wondering what I'm even doing here.
Oh boy, is it my turn again? I was starting to get bored! Now I can show you my swimsuit!
Well, that's one more loss than expected. Gotta say, I'm impressed. Though I did just learn to read the bumps on these cards.
About time it was my turn again! Took you long enough. Now, for my tunic...
Well, would you look at that? You got me to lose again. Congrats.
Well, would you look at that? You got me to lose again. Congrats.
Yeah, yeah, laugh it up, ~player~. But you're up next!
My turn again? Well, as I said, I brought a special swimsuit to wear to this. Wanna see it, ~player~?
Can't say I'm too mad about losing. I did only just learn to read the bumps on these cards.
I'm up again? Not a problem; I'm always down for a challenge.
Eh, so I lost that time. I could still beat you all in a fight any day!
I'm not scared of a loss or two. The losses help put the wins into perspective.
My turn again? Well, I can't see your cards, so I'll have to take your word for it.
Eh, it's still early. Not a fan of losing, but you gotta take whatever life throws at you.
Fine, you got me. But I wasn't really trying that round, so it doesn't count.
Yeah, yeah, my turn again... Let me just put these cards down.
Fine, you beat me. But you had an unfair advantage. I only just learned to read the bumps on the cards.
You know, honestly I think I'm more mad about losing this much than I am about getting naked. That doesn't really bother me.
Don't I know that... Zuko over here burned my feet a few years back! He didn't mean to, and he actually helped us end the war, but it wasn't fun being without my feet for a week while they healed.

Hmm... Well, it's really more about what nation you're from, but you seem like you train a lot, and that you're ambitious, highly competitive, and stubborn... I'd say you have the makings of an earthbender or a firebender!

Pfft, is that such a surprise? I can sense every detail over several feet, everything around me right down to ants walking across the ~background.surface~! Of course I can sense your bodies under your clothes!
I used to be a lot worse! It's all about earthbending. I use it as an extension of my senses, so I can see basically anything on the ground, except I don't "see" like you do!
Hey, don't ask me. Far as I can tell, people bang and sometimes the kid can chuck rocks.
Expanding the land? Magma? Well, it naturally expands through volcanoes, but if you're talking about doing it unnaturally...
Yeah, there are quite a few earthbenders around. But I'm the best and don't you forget it!
It's all about earthbending. It's a martial art where I can kick people's butts, sure, but the badgermoles taught me how to use it as an extension of my senses.
Really? I do like bass... I'll have to go to one of your performances some day! It'd have to beat the last concert I went to.
I guess I get what you mean. It took a ton of convincing just to get my dad to accept me, even after I saved the world.
Sure do! I kinda miss fighting in the Earth Rumbles because of that. But I'm happy with what I'm doing now.
Of course! But you also can't let people get you down. If they say you can't do something, do it just to spite them. That's how I learned metalbending!
Kinda hard to be stylish when I don't even know what colors go together, isn't it?
The thing about earth is that it's a stubborn element. Compliments are fine, but you have to be just as hard and stubborn if you want to learn how to bend it.
It sure gives me something to think about, being the only one who knows who has the least to compensate for!
Yeah! Humor can help me get through tough times, but it is really nice to get to cool off from work for once. This game is a good way of doing that.
I agree! Feeling is a big part of earthbending and how I sense things. Though... what's your career?
Hey, no problem. Everyone seems to forget I'm blind. Even I forget from time to time.
Heh. Impressed? You could say I'm the best fighter in my field.
Nah, I know what invisibility means, but it doesn't really work for me. Like paint. You could tell me what hair color you have and I'd be just as clueless as I was before.
Hey, magic doesn't exist! Unless we're counting Spirit World stuff, but that's more of Aang's vicinity... Hey, you aren't a spirit, are you?
I dunno, actually. Maybe they find me a bit abrasive? But their loss anyway, right? What about you? What's dating like for you as a heroine?
Audio versions? ...Well, couldn't hurt to hear one. What's your most popular?
Oh! So the bumps say things? Like how if I feel a lot of bumps on Sokka's face, it says that he needs to wash his face more?
I don't know how to explain it. I learned it from the badgermoles, and now I just kinda... do it.
Eh, that was years ago. I'm over it. That Wan Shi Tong guy is still a knucklehead, though. I mean, shouldn't the Avatar get a free pass?
Huh, I never thought of it that way. So if for example, I were to bend some metal into cuffs, I could pin my partner down and have fun with them?
Well... there's something to be said for people's reactions. The jolted breaths, the heightened heartbeat when getting nude or seeing someone else do so... it's kind of hot!
I can "see" you fine, that's what! I feel vibrations through the ground, so I can feel when you get nervous or excited. Buuuut if you want to moan louder when I beat you, that'll help.
Many times! That's why I like it so much. It's almost a guaranteed win! What about your favorite games?
Merchants, originally. Our wealth goes back several centuries. One of my descendants was even a politician and an earthbender like me!

Yeah, it's pretty sweet, isn't it? I got to use my earthbending to take down a bunch of guys--I even sabotaged an airship! These days, I mostly just run my school and help Aang kick a few butts here and there.
Oh, you're right about that! When I was a kid, locked away from people, there was nothing more that I wanted than to get out and have adventure! Wouldn't you agree?
With my bare feet on the ground like this, it's kinda like I can sense all of you through the earth. Imagine seeing through your feet!

All earthbenders feel a connection to the earth--mud, dirt, and rocks, and sometimes metal, sand, and even lava. We can control it with our mind, using our arms and legs, like I showed earlier. It has to be learned, but then it's like second nature.
Yep, a whole new generation of earthbenders and metalbenders. Maybe some will fight in Earth Rumble Tournaments like me. Hey, maybe I can duke it out with them one day!
That's about right! I can sense just about anything for several feet around me, big or small. When it comes to anything in the air or water, though... yeah, no luck.
Oh, that's for sure. We can't really bend wood like that. But then it depends on if you have any waterbenders who can help. The seas are more their territory!
Don't I know that... Another friend burned my feet a few years back! He didn't mean to, and he actually helped us end the war, but it wasn't fun being without my feet for a week while they healed.

condition.said: So, ~target~. When I am in Puyo battles I end up using electricity attacks, would that classify me as a bender of some type in your world?

case.state: Whoa... So you're a lightningbender! That's a subclass of firebending, and not everyone can do it! I wouldn't have guessed you could, to be honest...

Eh, it's whatever. I was a bit of a problem child, let's say. Didn't turn out how they wanted, and not just because I was blind. Rich parents are the worst because they have the highest expectations, y'know?

I have a complicated history with my parents, let's say. But what about this special talent of yours? Detecting when people are rich... that could help you out when it comes to pulling scams, couldn't it?
Hey, thanks, Cauliflower! It's not just for fighting--it's how I can sense all of you! Without seeing you here, I wouldn't get much out of this game, right?
Yeah, I figured. My friend Aang has a flying lemur who's kinda like that, though he does land and makes chirping sounds. It's a reminder that stuff not being on land is a bit of a weakness for me.
Mostly just Aang, talking to spirits is his thing. But I did help when the spirit Old Iron was threatening my father's refinery. Kicked that spirit's butt!
You mean like how I can read the cards? Well, you feel the bumps on them, right? I learned how to read those before I came in. Or... are you asking how I can sense all of you?
I've kinda gotten used to it by now since I first developed the sense. Think of it like seeing: You aren't constantly getting stimulated by everyone around you at all times, are you?
Well, since you seem like you won't judge... I gotta admit, I'm a little fascinated by the idea of showing off to people. Call it part of my curiosity about sight and how others see me.
Ah, I getcha. So you wanted to test yourself? Do you have any reason to think you will become violent?
Sure, I can hear alright, but I also have seismic sense. It's an extension of my earthbending that allows me to feel the vibrations through the ground. That's how I'm seeing you right now!
Venus? Jupiter?... Gotta admit, lady, I have no idea what spiritual nonsense you're talking about. I just bend because the badgermoles taught me.
First time I ever went to the Fire Nation, I had to go undercover because the War was still going on. I wore an outfit that was kinda like this, in fact!
It's been many years since I first went to the Fire Nation as a kid. My friends and I had to dress in disguise to blend in with other citizens. But Fire Nation clothes are surprisingly comfortable!
Here it comes... get ready...!
Oh, you guys are gonna love this, I can just tell...
When I've visited the Fire Nation more recently, I've forgone the use of underwear. Too muggy to bother, especially when it clings to your skin anyway.
Hey, I had no swimming top. You know what's coming next.
I guess you could say I didn't see this one coming!
Guess I'm stuck between a rock and a hard place!
Even without my eyes, I can see all of you just fine--I "see" with earthbending, by feeling the vibrations in the ground.
I don't see the same way you guys do. I use earthbending to feel the vibrations in the ground. It's kind of like seeing with my feet.
If only my friends could see me now. Taking off my pants and all. Ha! I can just imagine what they'd say.
You all just met me, but I wonder if it would be more or less weird if I were stripping with my friends instead of you guys.
Do you guys have any friends back home? Ha! I wonder what my own friends would say about me taking off my pants to~background.time~.
I may have mentioned this, but I used to be a professional earthbender! I fought in tournaments against some of the best, and I kicked serious butt!
When I was younger, I used to fight in the Earth Rumble tournaments! I went up against massive dudes like the Boulder and the Hippo, and I kicked all their butts!
When I was a kid, I used to fight in pro bending tournaments! I tricked the family seamstresses into making my Earth Rumble outfit for me.
Teaching my metalbending academy is a steady job and all, but I have to admit, I miss going out on adventures with my friends. I only ever see 'em a few times a year anymore.
I know I should be satisfied with teaching other young earthbenders, but... I'm bored! I miss going out and kicking butt every day, or fighting in pro bending competitions.
I'm getting tired of doing the same thing every day. Wake up, eat, teach kids metalbending, go to bed. I miss going on real adventures!
So... confession time. I don't really know how to make a strip tease "sexy." I've never actually seen one before...
I don't know much about how to strip tease. I've been to clubs, of course, but I've never really undressed for someone before.
I don't really care if you see me naked. For me, it's less about the reward at the end and more about the challenge.
Some people like to wear fancier or more revealing underwear than this. As you can guess, it doesn't do much for me.
Yeah, the spirits have a big presence in our world. I actually got to fight a spirit a while back with my students! Kicked its butt!
Yeah, it's worked out pretty well for me, hasn't it?
All it took to learn it were a combination of the right circumstances and pure, stubborn willpower!
Hmm... This sounds kinda like some Earth Kingdom superiority stuff. I'm not sure about using my bending for such a cause...
Yeah, I'm kinda used to it by now. But it's not always a good thing, you know. Like sometimes you see the people who you... really don't wanna see naked.
I'm sure it would, Doctor Death! There are many practical uses for bending, but I just like to use it to go poundy-poundy!
I don't know about power-enhancing gemstones, but I have a bracelet made of space rock. You should see what I can do with it!
Uh, yeah, I was gonna ask you about that, actually...
Hey, thanks. Maybe I'll catch one of your shows if you come to the Earth Kingdom!
Spite is a pretty great motivator, isn't it? Just being able to tell people, "You thought I couldn't do it, but I did it anyway!"
Well, if you're saying I don't look good, then I'm open to suggestions, o great Fashion Sifu!
Yeah, metalbending is pretty sweet. I can use it in fighting and it makes for a neat party trick!
True. Part of what we learn in earthbending is to wait and listen to the earth around us, to anticipate what will be happening.
It's my best talent! Well, second best. Third best? One of my best. What can I say? I'm a girl of many talents!
Ha! Sure, whatever you say, but we both know the truth.
In many ways, yeah! Though it's definitely a power that has limits. For example, I can't sense anything--or anyone--that's off the ground, like if it's floating in midair like ~flies~ over here.
OW! No! What? Why would you say that? I don't even have balls and that made me hurt!
I know, I know. I couldn't help it. Besides, am I wrong?
Hey, no problem. So, bending really doesn't exist in your world? That's gotta stink.
Oh, is there ever! We went on so many crazy adventures together. I know all about Aang and can give you all the juicy details you need to know.
Ha! Boy, I know all about them. Katara would freak if she knew I was telling you, though! Of course, she wouldn't be caught dead here to begin with.
Ha! You want info about them, you came to the right girl! Sokka, for instance. Sure, he's a genius, but he can't talk to girls at all! And he snores.
One thing I've tried with past partners is blindfolding them. Not being able to see really lets you focus on other stuff, like the sounds, the smells, the feeling of my body on theirs.
I can tell you're getting worked up by this, Chatterbox. I'll make sure to try that in the future.
Well, it used to be even more. My parents split up after I ran away, but my dad's still got a plant he's running, and I'm of course famous for helping the Avatar end the war.
I don't doubt it! I am pretty awesome, even though I don't know what type of people go to your school.
Ugh, tell me about it. Something about the outside being too dangerous for a blind girl. Or at least that's how my parents justified it. But I showed them!
Even more so! For example, if I had reason to believe you were cheating at this game, I could bury you into the earth. But you wouldn't give me reason to believe that, right?
In many ways, yeah! Though it's definitely a power that has limits. For example, I can't sense anything that's off the ground, like if it's floating in midair.
Yeah, actually, he's... kinda the new Fire Lord? Like he runs the country now and is helping to steer it in a good direction. And he's not doing bad so far!
You're quite the character, aren't you, Yumeko? You got the fighting, competitive spirit that would make an excellent bender in my world!
No, badgermoles. Giant, blind creatures that see with earthbending, like me!
It used to be a lot more. Aang would take us for journeys on his flying bison Appa, and I had to help take down an airship at one point!
Hey, any spirit who goes up against the Blind Bandit deserves what's coming to 'em. Especially if they hurt my friends.

They all balance each other out, yeah. And helping maintain that balance is what the Avatar cycle is be for! The Avatar is supposed to keep the peace and balance between the four nations. I should know, I helped him last time this was a problem.
Oh, hearing your voices helps for sure. But even if you don't, I can still sense all of you through your vibrations on the ~background.surface~!
Exactly! It's also part of why I'm less worried about losing my clothes--my seismic sense also lets me sense all of your bodies under your clothing as well! So it's like we're all naked!
Yeah... and there's a lot to be said for sensing other people's heart rates shoot way up as I'm taking off my clothes, too. Like they're getting as excited as I am!
Well, not killing people is... certainly an admirable goal.
You got that right! Besides, this thing will lose its shape without the belt, so why make people wait!
I also had to wear shoes to fully disguise myself as a Fire Nation citizen. Had to tear out the soles of the shoes so I could still see, though.
Biggest difference is that I had to wear shoes in order to disguise myself. I guess I could've worn them today, but why would I need to? The war is over, baby!
Ha! I totally fooled you, didn't I? I didn't bring a swimsuit! I can't swim, remember?
Ha! Did you fall for it? I can't swim, so I didn't wear a swimsuit!
What? With how hot it is in the Fire Nation, it's not uncommon to go commando! Trust me, I'd know.
Come on, ~player~. Don't act like you're not a little turned on by me not wearing any undies under my pants.
Man, one liners aren't as easy as Sokka makes them seem...
I've lost my touch. I used to be much better at these...
Katara may dig stuff like that, but I go for practicality above all else--shorts like these don't ride up my butt as much.
If I'm going for revealing, then I'd be better off wearing nothing at all, right?
So I can feel every detail of your bodies. I can also tell when you're lying or getting nervous, so I'll know when you're bluffing.
With this extra sense, I can feel every detail of your bodies--and yes, that includes when you're bluffing or getting aroused.
This outfit is kinda based on my Earth Rumble costume! Much bigger, of course, since I was like four feet back then.
That's where this outfit comes from! It's based on what I wore in my Earth Rumble days.
"The Blind Bandit," they called me. Came up with that myself. Anyway, my outfit's kinda based on what I wore back then!
I can tell you're looking, ~player~. No need to be coy about it.
Katara would probably say this isn't dignified of me, if we could convince her namby-pamby butt to even play the game, of course.
Poor Twinkletoes would be so bashful. He's soft, like a baby turtleduck. He'd probably try to avert his eyes!
Snoozles... well, I'd like to believe he'd fall for me, but that ship has sailed...
Zuko would... actually, I don't know about him. I never really got to know him as well as the others. How would he play strip poker?
At least coming here and going up against you guys is giving me some much-needed excitement!
Hey, fighting a bunch of people I don't know, stripping for them and making them strip for you--close enough, right?
Here, there's no judgment or anything--nobody cares about my status or that I'm a friend of the Avatar. There's only one status that matters: nude or not nude!
Apparently it's about making it titillating? But I don't really know how to do that, so... uh, here's my chest.
The subtle teasing stuff isn't really my style, I go at things head on. So... take a good, hard look!
So it's your turn, Mister Mystery. You've been awful quiet over there. So, what'll it be?
I bet you and Longshot would get along, ~player~. He's about as talkative as you. Well, what do you have?
Well, this game has been a bust. Wanna help make it worth it, ~player~?
You've gotten me down to my underwear, ~player~! I think it's only fair that you take something off.
Ha, I guess cards aren't your strong suit! Maybe you should focus on other talents?
Two down, Yuno! I've barely played with cards and even I know that there are tons of different card games out there. You're clearly not good at strip poker, so what games are you skilled at?
Finally took ya down, Shades! Although I bet I'm not the first person to do so, right?
I know pro bending matches aren't a thing here, but you sure have the body for it! Most of the guys I fought were pretty buff.
We should arm wrestle sometime, ~name~! I promise I won't cheat... much.
Gneiss going, ~name~! Now what will you take off next?
If it makes you feel any better, I won't be seeing anything that I couldn't already sense through the ground.
Hmm, ~name~'s turn? This should be interesting.
Your turn, ~name~! Show us something good!
Alright, ~name~. Better give us something good before we get bored.
Your turn, ~name~. Oh well, strip away, oh strip-master!
Oh, man! I think the dealer's got you pegged!
Ah, quit your bellyaching. You should be honored to be in the presence of Toph Beifong, and to be allowed to undress for her!
Nff... c'mon, ~name~! Sh-show the rest of us what you got!
~Target~'s turn? Well, I'm already getting down and dirty with it. Wanna give me something to work with?
Don't be embarrassed, ~target~. You've got nothing to hide.
The game's not over yet, ~name~. What'll it be?
Geesh, I guess I'll need some practice if I lost this early...
This guy again? You'd better give me something good. I'm already spent over here.
I may be finished, but I can still appreciate a show if you got one!
Oh, sorry, am I breaking your concentration, ~name~? I can feel your heart rate pounding.
Sorry to burst your bubble, ~name~, but I think it's about time for you to go again. Might as well, considering my current state.
Hey, I got my chest out for you, ~target~. Care to return the favor?
I'm almost nude and surprisingly bored. I think I've earned this.
I've already taken some stuff off, so I don't want to hear any whining from you, okay?
Oh, come on, ~name~. You chose to show up here to~background.time~, you've clearly been wanting to take something off.
Well, look whose turn it is. Miss Mysterious over there. Do you have something to say, or will you let your actions speak for you?
I've found there are two types of people: those who plan ahead, and those who kinda just fly on the seat of their pants. What type are you, ~player~?
Hey, Wiki-tan? I, uh, I wanted to ask, based on your outfit, I assume you're a good swimmer?
You know, Hanako... You remind me of a friend I know. He's also very emotional like you, and a little timid.
What's the matter? Can't handle a few losses? Want some cheese with your whine?
Your turn again, Chatterbox! I can tell you're feeling all pent up in that top.
Hey, Grunt, what you were describing earlier, about expanding the land around you... that sounds an awful lot like you're part of some terrorist group!
Hey, so you have those powers, right? Are those spirit world abilities or something?
Hmmm... Nope, not buying it. There's something else.
Your turn again, Arueshalae... You mentioned last time that you're looking for a new purpose? What have you tried doing? Like, what are you good at?
So, are you some kind of knowledge spirit? You seem to know a lot about... well, everything.
Oh! Hey Chatterbox, while you're up, I got another question for ya! You said you have an article on me?
So your knowledge... is that some kind of special power? That's kind of a boring power if so.
Your turn again, Chatterbox! I can tell you're feeling all pent up in that swimsuit.
Whoa. That's weird.
Well, I'll be a baby tigerdillo. You really are from space, aren't you? What's that like?
You seem a little... different somehow. Usually people look a certain way when they're on the ground. Are you from the Spirit World?
Hey, Starfire! You wouldn't happen to be a firebender, would you? Just kinda guessed by your name.
I hear you work a lot with weird animals, Gloria! I've done stuff with animals too. I actually learned bending from giant badgermoles!
Strange. Unless I'm sensing this wrong, there's something... different about you two.
Hey, Chatterbox! You've been telling me so much about everyone else, but what are you into? What's your type?
So, you fight bad guys, I take it? I do that here and there! Is that your day-to-day job?
What's it like being a musician? I've met some guys in a band before, and I can imagine it gets tiring always going on the road from place to place.
So... what was it? Shy? Guess that's fitting... erm, so what do you do when you're not taking your clothes off? Do you have a job?
...Darling, was it? I hear you used to be a wrestler. Is that so?
...Whoa. I dunno how I just noticed this, but your back seems... misshapen. Are you alright?
So, I heard you've been all around the world! What's it like where you're from?
Hey, do you think you could get on the ~background.surface~? I'm not getting much of a view over here.
You're an archaeologist, huh? My friends and I met one several years ago! Guess there's something to be said for digging for stuff in the dirt.
So, Short Stuff, what's in that chest of yours? Anything I can bend?
Hey, Shy! Do you ever like to get physically active? Y'know, playing sports and all that?
You're up again, Shy! I've told you all about my bending abilities, but what about you? Do you have any special skills that you're proud of?
So what, are you a waterbender or something? We should have a duel after I finish kicking your butt here!
So what, are you a waterbender or something? We should have a duel after you lose over here!
Oh, it's you. Kinda forgot you were there. So, what's your deal?
Team Magma, eh? Magma is an interesting element. It's kind of earth, kind of fire... Are any of you guys benders of any sort?
Travelling with the Avatar, I've tasted grub from all over--the Earth Kingdom, Fire Nation, even the Southern Water Tribe. What's the food like where you're from, Gloria?
So, I hear you're quite the jewel thief! I'm not currently in a position to help, but you ever consider getting an earthbender on your team?
Huh. Well, that's weird.
Psst. Hey, Invisible Girl. I can see you.
So, you guys can bend elements like I can? I didn't know bending existed in other worlds.

In our world, we have different specialists among each type of benders. For example, some earthbenders can bend sand, magma, or metal--I was the first metalbender. Do you have special uses for Psynergy?
Your turn again, Mia. I gotta ask, does anyone ever treat you differently because of your use of the elements?
Yumeko... There's something going on with you that you haven't let on, isn't there?
You're up again, Wager Woman! I gotta ask, how did you get into gambling in the first place? When I first met you, you seemed super sophisticated, and not like you'd get off on gambling.
You said you've been gambling for as long as you can remember, right? I suspect that got you in a lot of trouble at school, unless it was some kind of school for gambling.
Hey, Card Shark, no offense but you aren't doing well in this game... but you're taking your losses so well. How do you do that? Surely you've lost a few games before.
Your turn again, Yumeko! You've risked exposing yourself to everyone. Is there anything you wouldn't gamble in a game of cards? Like, anything that's too valuable to risk losing?
Jeez! Hey, I don't know if you've noticed, but you've got massive wings! Are you some kind of half-human sky spirit or something?
So you're a type of demon? Well, what is it that succubuses--succubi?--what do you do, exactly?
You're something of a fighter, aren't you, Nagatoro? You've got that competitive spirit, I can tell.
